MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL45 postcode area of LLanbedr. Restoration is longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:17am on 2nd November 2020.
